name: decadently
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are only interested in pleasure and fun: The recipes are really spectacular and so decadently delicious. We met in the decadently ornate surroundings of the latest wildly expensive London restaurant.
disapproving in a way that shows that you have low moral standards: Their art was considered to be decadently individualistic. They live a life of decadently extravagant consumerist excess.
More examplesFewer examplesThe beds were decadently soft and the television screen was absurdly wide.The fruit was rich, soft, and decadently sweet from the amber syrup.He was the first star to be paid a million dollars a year, and also lived decadently.
